definition: abbr. for Bengbu prefecture-level city 蚌埠市[Beng4 bu4 shi4], Anhui
luxuriant/buxom/variant of 豐|丰[feng1]/variant of 風|风[feng1]/appearance/charm
mussels/bivalves grown in rivers and lakes
lit. sandpiper and clam war together (and the fisherman catches both) (idiom); fig. neighbors who can't agree lose out to a third party
lit. an old oyster producing a pearl (idiom)/fig. birthing a son at an advanced age
Bengshan district of Bengbu city 蚌埠市[Beng4 bu4 shi4], Anhui
Bengshan district of Bengbu city 蚌埠市[Beng4 bu4 shi4], Anhui
elephant trunk clam/geoduck (Panopea abrupta), large clam with a long proboscis (native to the west coast of North America)
lit. sandpiper and clam war together and the fisherman catches both (idiom); fig. neighbors who can't agree lose out to a third party
pinyin: yu4 bang4 xiang1 zheng1 , yu2 weng1 de2 li4

sentences.english: A nicked pearl opens a treasure of innovation.
sentences.chinese: 一個撥開的珍珠蚌打開了創新的寶藏。

sentences.english: I have fish, oysters and clams. Could you help me clean them?
sentences.chinese: 我有魚，蠔和蚌，能否請你幫我洗呢？

sentences.english: When I standed up and looked around, just several people were still digging.
sentences.chinese: 當我站起來環顧四周時，只有幾個人依然在挖蚌。

sentences.english: Our lunch of freshly BBQ'd goodies including oysters, clams, mussels, pippies and some kind of conch shells.
sentences.chinese: 我們的午餐包括新鮮烤的牡蠣，蚌，蛤，蜊和螺絲。

sentences.english: Second, the propagation and artificial breeding techniques of H. schlegeli was carried out.
sentences.chinese: 對池蝶蚌的繁育技術進行了研究。

sentences.english: If we left these a year longer, they'd be of bette r quality.
sentences.chinese: 假如我們讓珍蚌多長一年，它們的質量就會更好。

sentences.english: Every child, but without the clam qualitative and biofuel is.
sentences.chinese: 凡蚌孕珠，乃無質而生質。

sentences.english: The harvest moon, the old or very clam judah.
sentences.chinese: 中秋月明，則老蚌猶喜甚。

sentences.english: The more intestinal microflora exists, the more harmful is to the growth of Hyriopsis cumingii.
sentences.chinese: 腸道菌羣增多不利於三角帆蚌的生長髮育。

sentences.english: He is the pearl, the tides, clam no static shock safe haven in place.
sentences.chinese: 他海濱無珠者，潮汐震撼，蚌無安身靜存之地也。

sentences.english: I totally lost myself into digging clam, I didn't pay much attention to the water.
sentences.chinese: 我徹底投入到挖蚌中了，沒有多注意漲潮上來的水。

sentences.english: These results showed that the mantellum of all the four testing mussels are good protein resources.
sentences.chinese: 這四種淡水蚌外套膜是一類優質的動物蛋白質資源。

sentences.english: Well, there was the time served green-lipped mussels from New Zealand.
sentences.chinese: 好，有時間來品嚐從新西蘭來的綠脣蚌。

sentences.english: A clam swam to the bank and opened its shell in the sun.
sentences.chinese: 一天，河裏的蚌游到岸邊，把蚌殼張開曬太陽。

sentences.english: Keep turning over until all the mussels have opened - throw away any that remain closed.
sentences.chinese: 持續翻炒直到所有蚌都打開，沒有開的就丟掉。

sentences.english: Superiority and inferiority in cultivation of innovation enterprises in Hefei-Wuhu-Bengbu pilot area is very obvious.
sentences.chinese: 合蕪蚌試驗區培育創新型企業的優劣勢都很明顯。

definition: mussels/bivalves grown in rivers and lakes
a legendary dragon with the ability to control rain and floods/see also 蛟龍|蛟龙[jiao1 long2]
